lines.text: Your brats are unbearable, and I will not tolerate this any longer!

[singing]
Hee-haw hee-haw haw, I'm the donkey Petrika! Hee-haw hee-haw haw, I'm rather a good kicka'!
Now what did I do wrong... this time? Forgive me, Rada, I shall never never do it again!

[singing]
Mum is home, now you can open the door. Don't be afraid now, not any more.
Get away, GET AWAY! Keep your dirty hands away!
My children's attitudes will not be criticized by you.
